Order module_4

order.py This module contains the ‘Order’ class, which represents a customer order in a pizza ordering system.

The ‘Order’ class allows adding pizzas to the order, calculating the total cost, and marking the order as paid.

class src.order.Order

Bases: object

This class represents a customer’s pizza order.

The ‘Order’ class stores a list of pizzas, tracks the total cost, and manages whether the order has been paid.

input_pizza(crust, sauce, cheese, toppings)

Add a pizza with specified options to the customer’s order.

Updates:

pizza_objects (list): Adds the new pizza object to the list of pizzas in the order. cost (float): Updates the total cost of the order by adding the cost of the new pizza.

order_paid()

Mark the order as paid.

Updates:

paid (bool): Sets the ‘paid’ flag to True to indicate that order was paid.
